question: Which Tennis player became the first to enter semi-finals after defeating Rafael Nadal?
explanation:
Austrian Tennis star Dominic Thiem became the first player to move into the semi-finals of the ATP Finals event in London.
He beat world No 2 Rafael Nadal in a high-quality match with a tie-break. Stefanos Tsitsipas, who beat Andrey Rublev will face Nadal and the winner will join Thiem in the semi-finals.
